title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu sometimes fails to close all the editors.
EB: It should close the file without saving any changes, as no modifications have been made to the file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new file 'f1.txt'. 2. Open multiple editors. 3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
